text: Leif Målberg (born 1 September 1945) is a former Swedish footballer. Målberg played his whole career for IF Elfsborg from 1965 to 1980. He was one of the club's most important defenders at the time. He played 337 games for his club. He was a member of the Sweden national football team in the 1970 FIFA World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish footballers Category:Sweden international footballers Category:1970 FIFA World Cup players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:IF Elfsborg players Category:Swedish football managers Category:IF Elfsborg managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Leif Målberg
